data.title: Olives and Oil New Haven
data.meta_description: AN ITALIAN RESTAURANT WITH AN ELECTRIC TWIST.  Olives and Oil in New Haven is where old world meets new world, with vintage decor and an urban flair. It’s the perfect spot to get together, share (or not share!) a plate, and enjoy food from all over Italy.
data.text:
“Our classes are perfect for individuals, couples, and groups. It's a fantastic way to bond, learn, and enjoy the fruits of your labor.”

Discover the secrets of Italian cuisine with our Pizza, Pasta, and Mozzarella Classes at Olives and Oil in New Haven. Unleash your inner chef and savor the joy of creating your own delicious dishes!

“We specialize in crafting unforgettable memories.”

We’re an event venue with a customizable menu and a unique atmosphere. With a psychedelic pig on the wall, a brick oven on display, and a chef who can’t be anything but creative, Olives and Oil is THE spot for your next event.
